paragraph.value: We compare our model with the state-of-the-art models in Table 3.  As
shows, this model alone (without any reranking) improves the state-of-the-art performance from

accuracy  Increasing the beam size improves the performance as expected.  Using a pre-trained model improves the performance as well.  Reranking with a threshold rule may be helpful for the overall architecture. We observe that reranking by the critic at all times may not be the
approach. We note that choosing not to rerank when all scores are below
increases the performance further. On the other hand, reranking if the

paragraph.expression: "difference between the best score and second best score"

paragraph.value: is above the threshold we set does not help in this case.  The overall architecture improves the performance of the generator (
